Articles.Content: Quick question ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I've seen some engines that allow for the nozzle of the jet engine to expand with thrust input. Is there a way to do this in stock KSP or does it require a plugin? I know that BahaSP has a module within its plugin which accomplishes this with an animation, but I'd like to keep it as stock as possible.

> 
> FXModuleThrottle or suchlike. It's stock.

Ok great, thanks, found it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
